Initializer# init(orientation:boundingBox:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+

```
init(
    orientation: simd_quatf = simd_quatf(ix: 0, iy: 0, iz: 0, r: 1),
    boundingBox: BoundingBox = BoundingBox.empty
)
```
